meta.name: Voice-to-Email Response System with Telegram, OpenAI Whisper & Gmail

parameters.text:
=Email ID: {{ $('New Email Received').item.json.id }}
Thread ID: {{ $('New Email Received').item.json.threadId }}
From: {{ $('New Email Received').item.json.from.value[0].name }}
Email: {{ $('New Email Received').item.json.from.value[0].address }}
Subject: {{ $('New Email Received').item.json.subject }}

{{ $('New Email Received').item.json.text.replace(/_/g, '\\_')
        .replace(/\*/g, '\\*')
        .replace(/\[/g, '\\[')
        .replace(/\]/g, '\\]')
        .replace(/\(/g, '\\(')
        .replace(/\)/g, '\\)')
        .replace(/~/g, '\\~')
        .replace(/`/g, '\\`')
        .replace(/>/g, '\\>')
        .replace(/#/g, '\\#')
        .replace(/\+/g, '\\+')
        .replace(/-/g, '\\-')
        .replace(/=/g, '\\=')
        .replace(/\|/g, '\\|')
        .replace(/\{/g, '\\{')
        .replace(/\}/g, '\\}')
        .replace(/\./g, '\\.')
        .replace(/!/g, '\\!')
        .replace(/\\/g, '\\\\').substring(0, 100) + '...'; }}

nodes.name: It needs to be an audio message + a reply!

parameters.text:
=Sorry, I didn't catch that! 

To send your email for you, I need you to respond with a voice note in reply to one of my other messages.

parameters.content:
## 1. New Email Received

Our workflow is triggered when a new email comes in. 

We use an IF node here to only run the automation on incoming emails to the INBOX - not in the SENT folder.

## 2. Check If Email Needs a Response

We use ChatGPT to check if the email needs a reply. Anything sent with an "unsubscribe" button or "manage preferences" is ignored. Anything that comes from a company (e.g. sent from "noreply@example.com"), or has the format of a newsletter doesn't need a response.

We use an output parser so that we can use an IF node on the output.

parameters.text:
=Do you think the following email requires me to create a response or not? Your answer should be Y if yes, or N if not. Format your answer as a JSON as either { response: Y } or { response: N } Do not add anything else to your answer at all.

Criteria for emails that require a reply:
- Direct questions or requests for information, action, or confirmation.
- Messages seeking clarification or feedback.
- Invitations to meetings or events that need a confirmation or rejection.
- Emails indicating follow-up is expected or explicitly asking for a reply.
- Client/customer queries or feedback that require acknowledgment.
- Personal emails from somebody who might be my friend

Criteria for emails that do not require a reply:
- The email address contains "no-reply" or "noreply"!
- Informational or update emails with no explicit call for action or response.
- Automated notifications (e.g., system alerts, newsletters, etc.).
- CC/BCC emails where no direct response is expected.
Replies that only acknowledge receipt (e.g., "Thank you," "Noted").

Examples:

Input:
From - "Nutricals Men's Wellness" <store+67435528508@g.shopifyemail.com>
Subject - Copy of British Men Swear By This
Body: Are You Ready to Try? ğŸš€

Input:
From - {{ $json.from.value[0].name }} <{{ $json.from.value[0].address }}>
Subject - {{ $json.subject }}
Body: {{ $json.text }}

parameters.content:
## 3. Send Email to Telegram

We use a VoicerEmailer bot to send the email over a Telegram message to our account on Telegram.

## 4. Telegram Reply Received

This workflow is triggered when the Telegram bot receives a message. 

We check that the message is a reply to a previous email message, and that the reply is an audio message. 

If not, we send a message back telling them what they did wrong.

## 5. Audio Transcription

We get the audio file from the Telegram message and send it to OpenAI's Whisper API to get a transcription of the message.

messageValues.message:
=You are a helpful assistant who translates rough voicemail messages into polished emails.

You will be given an email which is expecting a reply, as well as a voice message transcription which address the email. You should output a reply.

Don't include the subject line. Only include a rephrasing of the answer given in the voice note. Do not make up an answer to fit any questions in the original email. 

Use the same tone, and broadly the same phrasing, as the voice note. Include a sign-off.

Don't include any other padding or explanation in your answer.

Examples:

USER INPUT:

Received Email:
Email ID: 19272309c9c81678
Thread ID: 19272309c9c81678
From: ulrike roesler (via tibet-core Mailing List)
Email: tibet-core@maillist.ox.ac.uk
Subject: Pre-term gathering this Friday, 7pm

Dear Adam,

Just a brief reminder that the Tibetan & Himalayan Studies pre\\-term
gathering will take place \*this Friday from 7pm at the Royal Oak \\(Woodstock
Road\\)\*\\. I have reserved a table for "Tibetan Studies"\\.

We will start by discussing the timetable, and those attending classes this
coming term are therefore asked to arrive at 7pm\\. Everyone else is welcome
to join anytime during the evening\\.

I attach a draft timetable, but please note that there may still be some
small adjustments to the class times\\. The final version of the timetable
will be circulated after our meeting\\.

I look forward to seeing you soon,

Ulrike

\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*\*
Ulrike Roesler
Professor of Tibetan and Himalayan Studies
Oriental Institute
Pusey Lane
Oxford, OX1 2LE
\\+44\\-1865\\-278236

Voice Note Response:
Hey Ulrike, sorry, I won't be there because I'm currently in San Marcos La Laguna in Guatemala So I can't be there for the Tibetan Studies gathering This coming Friday, I'm sorry

---

ASSISTANT RESPONSE:

Hi Ulrike,

Thanks for letting me know about the pre-term gathering this Friday. 

Unfortunately, I wonâ€™t be able to attend, as I'm currently in San Marcos La Laguna, Guatemala. 

I'm sorry to miss out on the discussion.

Thanks,

Adam

parameters.content:
## 5. Create Email Draft

Finally, we get ChatGPT to write up a response, given the original email for context and our voice note reply. 

We create a new draft in Gmail, which shows up in the same email thread. We sent a link to the newly created draft to the user via Telegram.

## Edit here
Add in your Chat ID here.
